text:
This screen all your personal custom albums.

For each album, the number at the top right is the count of talks inside that custom album. The number below it is the total duration of all these talks.

Touch the '+' button at the top right to create a new custom album.

To change an album's title or photograph, slide your finger right to left on the album.  This will bring up a menu allowing you to do these operations.

Touch the album to view talks contained within it.
